officialTitle: Inflammatory Response and Clinical Outcome After On-pump Beating Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting Using Left Ventricular Assist Versus Biventricular Assist in Patients With Severe Left Ventricle Dysfunction
inclusionCriteria:
* patients with severe left ventricle dysfunction with an ejection fraction (EF)≤40%, being scheduled for revascularization.
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* myocardial infarction within the preceding 4 weeks
* severe valve disease requiring valve replacement
* cardiac reoperations
